author: pdodds
msg: Updated the samples to work cleanly with the new Maven plugin functionality

author: pdodds
msg: Updated the JBI plugins to better enable the deployment of projects,  including new goals for the automatic deployment of a project and all its dependencies as well as a goal that starts a servicemix under the build directory and then deploys the current project (and dependencies).  Might need to move this functionality out of the JBI plugin and into a ServiceMix plugin later?
